General.Name: Surf Air Mobility Inc.
General.Description: Surf Air Mobility Inc. engages in the air mobility business in the United States and internationally. Its air mobility platform provides scheduled commercial air service flights; and on-demand flights created for customers on an ad-hoc, by request basis. Surf Air Mobility Inc. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Hawthorne, California.
General.Address: 12111 South Crenshaw Boulevard, Hawthorne, CA, United States, 90250

3.Name: Mr. Liam  Fayed
